title: Party on: Wave offering free transportation on Halloween

What: Fall Festival When: 5-9 p.m. Oct. 31 Where: 550 Heights What to expect: Pumpkin-carving and costume contests, live music, face-painting and door prizes Tickets: $35, includes choice of burger ... more Image 9 of 9 Party on: Wave offering free transportation on Halloween 1 / 9 Back to Gallery Witches and warlocks donâ€™t need a broom to get to and from their favorite haunts this Halloween.
The Wave Jitney is offering free transportation along its routes from 10 p.m.-3 a.m. Oct. 31.
Underwritten by retail electricity provider Power Express , the free rides will be available for the following routes: Midtown, Downtown, Uptown Park/Galleria, Upper Kirby/Shepherd, Washington Corridor, The Heights, Montrose/Museum District and Rice Village.
Call 713-863-9283 to book your Halloween ride or visit thehoustonwave.com .
Browse the slideshow above to find your perfect Halloween party.
